sys_update_xml.payload: c.location-wrapper { display: flex; color: #2e2e2e; >div { flex-grow: 1; flex-basis: 0; } .map { display: flex; .img-responsive { margin: 0 auto; } } .status-wrapper { display: flex; flex-direction: column; .status { display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; flex-grow: 1; .value { font-size: 42px; font-weight: 300; .big-number { float: left; } .side-note { margin-top: 15px; margin-left: 5px; float: left; font-size: 10px; color: #b4b2b3; } &.positive svg { fill: #70be5a; } &.negative svg { fill: #e51b24; } } .description { font-size: 12px; font-weight: 500; color: #b4b2b3; } } svg { width: 20px; height: 13px; } } }sp_instancetruepe-csm-locationfalsePE CSM Locationfalsefalsesp_widgetsush.chan2017-04-17 17:48:44truefb690aff1342fa00de8cb5b12244b02019PE CSM Locationglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_fb690aff1342fa00de8cb5b12244b020steven.gregory2017-06-06 18:26:11
